alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 04 at 11:30PM CDT until May 05 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BEAVER...LIPSCOMB...NORTH CENTRAL HEMPHILL AND EAST CENTRAL OCHILTREE COUNTIES... At 1129 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles east of Wolf Creek Park, or 11 miles west of Lipscomb, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Lipscomb, Follett and Darrouzett. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
